objects.specification: A sturdy rectangular wall panel with a smooth matte finish in light gray. It has a uniform thickness of 0.1 meters and stands three meters tall, providing a clean backdrop and solid enclosure for the booth.

A sturdy rectangular wall panel with a smooth matte finish in light gray. It has a uniform thickness of 0.1 meters and stands three meters tall, providing a clean enclosure and cohesive look with the back wall.

A modern reception desk with a sleek rectangular form and vibrant glossy red finish. It features clean lines, subtle chamfered edges, and slim metal supports underneath. The top surface is perfectly flat for brochure display and business interactions.

A freestanding display shelf with four evenly spaced tiers, each tier wide and shallow to showcase products. It has a crisp white lacquered finish, slender metal supports, and recessed joints for a minimalist, airy appearance.

A lightweight horizontal fabric banner with a smooth matte surface. It features a vibrant gradient transitioning from deep blue on the left to bright cyan on the right, mounted on a slender aluminum hanging rod, adding visual branding above the reception area.

A decorative large potted plant with a tapered cylindrical terracotta pot approximately 0.5 meters wide and 0.7 meters high. On top, lush green foliage with broad, healthy leaves rises to about 1.5 meters, adding a natural accent in the corner.

A sleek flat-screen digital display with a thin black bezel and matte anti-glare finish. It measures one meter wide by 0.6 meters tall and is mounted at eye level for promotional video content.
